ygData.subject: New to club.
ygData.msgSnippet: hey glad to be a member of the club. I live out in the south pacific and I m getting the game by mail in just a few days. (I hope tomorrow) I can t wait to get
ygData.messageBody:
hey glad to be a member of the club. I live out
in the south pacific and I'm getting the game by
mail in just a few days. (I hope tomorrow) I can't
wait to get started. Several of my friends back home
have the game and want me to get on-line so we start a
guild. My question is...Does the game really have enough
in it to keep you intrested. And for those who have
played a whole lot, do you find different and new things
each time you play? Well Hope to hear from everyone.
Thanks.<br> mark
